ygData.subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, that has always bugged me.  How come we cannot sneak while invisible? What good is Sneak at all if its becomes useless 2 levels after you get it? Oh
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, that has always bugged me. How come we cannot sneak while invisible?
What good is Sneak at all if its becomes useless 2 levels after you get it?
Oh well, just goes back to the theory of bards being thrown together at the
last minute again I guess.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual Bard Invisibility Question


From: <kim@...>

On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> You know now that I think back on it, I remember thinking it was weird at
> the time because I got the message about becoming visible. It could have
> been some sort of glitch graphics-wise and he wasn't where he appeared to
> be. We have used Selo's in conjunction with Clouding but since we were
> moving I'm not sure if the other bard playing Selo's was ever spotted.
> Everything I conned was indifferent though.

My rogue friend always disbands from me if he needs to do any
sneaking around because my songs blow his "invisibility." It
doesn't make him visible, but I think the way it works is that
while the song is pulsing, the mobs can see you.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...

with the subject submissions.
